description: A compact and comfortable combo, designed especially for the minimalistic, wire-free desktop.Comfort is key.The whisper-quiet, low-profile keys bring a whole new level of comfort to your fingertips. What's more, keep all your most-used functions and media controls closer than ever with our arsenal of Windows-dedicated hot keys.Powerful perseverance.Ultra-low power consumption keeps the keyboard going through 700 hours of continuous use. The automatic sleep mode adds even more perseverance - giving you up to a year between battery changes.Compact and Customizable.Crafted with materials carefully selected to add aesthetics as well as comfort, this compact mouse creates a touching experience for your fingertips. Enjoy ergonomics that fit to your palm like a glove - just slightly smaller. What's more, adjust the selected sensitivity (1000, 1500 and 2000 DPI) at the press of a button.Unified convenience.Adopting advanced 2.4G wireless technology, the combo provides a convenient cordless connection, effectively decluttering your desktop. The unified nano receiver occupies minimum space around the crowded USB-port dock, and keeps a precious USB port open.Get to know us.We created Anker with a single goal in mind: to make the smart life easier. That means starting with affordable, high-quality gear and ending with a commitment to 100% user satisfaction and an 18-month warranty. After all, we're customers too.
title: Anker® Mini Wireless Slim Keyboard and Optical Mouse Combo for Desktop, Win 8 / 7 / Vista / XP
